Levels.study_trial: On study trials participants viewed the route in full
Levels.catch_trial: Catch trials were instereted to ensure participants were paying actively learning. On catch trials the route would stop at a given picture number (see test_picture) and participants would be tested on the route (see test_type)

route_number.Description: The route-unique number. In each experiment two sets of routes were used across participants. Group 1 subjects learned routes 1-4 and Group 2 subjects learned routes 5-8. See participant list for each subjects group number.

test_type.Description: On catch trials subjects were tested about the destination of the route or the direction of the next turn.

Levels.direction: On direction test trials participants selected the direction of the upcoming turn (left or right)
Levels.destination: On destination test trials participants selected the destination name of the current route

test_picture.Description: For catch trial this value represents the picture number in the route on which the trial stopped for the test.

test_response.Description: Participants response to the catch trial.

test_RT.Description: Participants response time to the catch trial. If blank participants did not respond

test_correct.Description: Binary value representing wether the participant correctly answered the catch trial quesiton
